sn45.42-47:1.1: “Sace vo, bhikkhave, annatitthiya paribbajaka evam puccheyyum:
sn45.42-47:1.2: ‘kimatthiyam, avuso, samane gotame brahmacariyam vussati’ti, evam puttha tumhe, bhikkhave, tesam annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam evam byakareyyatha:
sn45.42-47:1.6: ‘asavanam khayattham kho, avuso, bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati’ti …pe…
